channel.description: The shows you love, issues that matter: Rachel Maddow, Lawrence O'Donnell, Chris Hayes, Chris Matthews, Al Sharpton, Ed Schultz, Joe Scarborough.
channel.title: msnbc.com Latest Headlines

item.title: msnbc News Quiz: Kissing lawmaker
item.description: Which Republican lawmaker announced he would be seeking re-election this fall, despite previously saying he wouldn’t run again?

item.title: Nina Turner's fight for voting rights
item.description: A Republican attempt to manipulate the vote has been extremely clear in the state of Ohio. Ed Schultz visits with candidate for Secretary of State Nina Turner, who's fighting to save the right to vote.
